desc: This method returns a list of files within the team. It can be filtered and sliced in various ways.

user.desc: Filter files created by a single user.

ts_from.desc: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive).

ts_to.desc: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive).

types.desc:
Filter files by type:

all - All files
posts - Posts
snippets - Snippets
images - Image files
gdocs - Google docs
zips - Zip files
pdfs - PDF files


You can pass multiple values in the types argument, like types=posts,snippets.The default value is all, which does not filter the list.

count.desc: Number of items to return per page.

page.desc: Page number of results to return.

errors.user_not_found: Value passed for user was invalid
errors.unknown_type: Value passed for types was invalid
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
